product.name: Holographic Halo Finishing Powder
product.description: Glow your own way using Holographic Halo Finishing Powder! This ultra-fine loose powder comes in two pearly shades and delivers an ethereal look that’s crazy gorgeous. Lightly dust it all over your complexion to set and softly illuminate, or along the highest points of the face—like the bridge of the nose, cheekbones or Cupid’s bow—to add a touch of radiance here and there.
